                                      throws java.io.IOException

getLastTextDescendant

public static nu.xom.Text getLastTextDescendant(nu.xom.Node node)
gets last text descendant of element. this might be referenced from the following-sibling and will therefore be the immediately preceding chunk of text in document order if the node is a text node returns itself

Parameters:
node -
Returns:
Text node or null

getFirstTextDescendant

public static nu.xom.Text getFirstTextDescendant(nu.xom.Node node)

Parameters:
node -
Returns:
Text node or null
